title: Hospitality Competency Enhancement: IMS Learning Design Runtime Change Management via Hierarchical Petri Nets

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Hierarchical Petri net models can restructure workflows without data loss when modifying learning activities during runtime
Appropriately select safe modification mode (no participant impact) or risk mode (requires safety checkpoint relocation) based on situational needs
Real-time page replacement mechanisms are implemented in IMS LD-based social problem-solving scenarios

Learners analyze formative assessment results (quiz scores, task performance) to select one of three learning pathways (basic/advanced/supplementary), and establish personalized learning plans on a biweekly basis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
